name: Elegant Expansions
landing_text: Hello There $(#ff0000)$(l)$(playername)$()$(br)I am so happy that you have installed my mod <3 !$(br2)$(5)$(l)Welcome to Elegant Expansions!$()$(br2)Elegant Expansions is a Mod made for added exploration, immersion and new challenges.$(br)Check out the new Biomes, Gems, Armour and Creatures, Including 2 Brand New Bosses
subtitle: The Complete Guide
